00061   struct MyPolicy : Policy {
00062     static void init_options() {
00063       cmdline_desc("Usage: %s [Options]\n\n"
00064         "This is a command line interface to the DFS broker.\n\n"
00065         "Options").add_options()
00066         ("eval,e", str(), "Evalute semicolon separted commands")
00067         ;
00068     }
00069   };
00070 
00071   typedef Meta::list<MyPolicy, DfsClientPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00072 
00073   char *line_read = 0;
00074 
00075   char *rl_gets () {
00076 
00077     if (line_read) {
00078       free (line_read);
00079       line_read = (char *)NULL;
00080     }
00081 
00082     /* Get a line from the user. */
00083     line_read = readline ("dfsclient> ");
00084 
00085     /* If the line has any text in it, save it on the history. */
00086     if (line_read && *line_read)
00087       add_history (line_read);
00088 
00089     return line_read;
00090   }
00091 
00092 } // local namespace

00095 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00096   try {
00097     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00098 
00099     String host = get_str("DfsBroker.Host");
00100     uint16_t port = get_i16("DfsBroker.Port");
00101     uint32_t timeout_ms = get_i32("timeout");
00102 
00103     DfsBroker::Client *client = new DfsBroker::Client(host, port, timeout_ms);
00104 
00105     vector<InteractiveCommand *>  commands;
00106     commands.push_back(new CommandCopyFromLocal(client));
00107     commands.push_back(new CommandCopyToLocal(client));
00108     commands.push_back(new CommandLength(client));
00109     commands.push_back(new CommandMkdirs(client));
00110     commands.push_back(new CommandRemove(client));
00111     commands.push_back(new CommandRmdir(client));
00112     commands.push_back(new CommandShutdown(client));
00113     commands.push_back(new CommandExists(client));
00114 
00118     String eval = get_str("eval", String());
00119     size_t i;
00120 
00121     if (eval.length()) {
00122       std::vector<String> strs;
00123       split(strs, eval, is_any_of(";"));
00124 
00125       foreach(String cmd, strs) {
00126         trim(cmd);
00127 
00128         for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00129           if (commands[i]->matches(cmd.c_str())) {
00130             commands[i]->parse_command_line(cmd.c_str());
00131             commands[i]->run();
00132             break;
00133           }
00134         }
00135         if (i == commands.size()) {
00136           HT_ERRORF("Unrecognized command : %s", cmd.c_str());
00137           return 1;
00138         }
00139       }
00140       return 0;
00141     }
00142 
00143     cout <<"Welcome to dsftool, a command-line interface to the DFS broker.\n"
00144          <<"Type 'help' for a description of commands.\n" << endl;
00145 
00146     using_history();
00147     const char *line;
00148 
00149     while ((line = rl_gets()) != 0) {
00150       if (*line == 0)
00151         continue;
00152 
00153       for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00154         if (commands[i]->matches(line)) {
00155           commands[i]->parse_command_line(line);
00156           commands[i]->run();
00157           break;
00158         }
00159       }
00160 
00161       if (i == commands.size()) {
00162         if (!strcmp(line, "quit") || !strcmp(line, "exit"))
00163           exit(0);
00164         else if (!strcmp(line, "help")) {
00165           cout << endl;
00166           for (i=0; i<commands.size(); i++) {
00167             Usage::dump(commands[i]->usage());
00168             cout << endl;
00169           }
00170         }
00171         else
00172           cout << "Unrecognized command." << endl;
00173       }
00174 
00175     }
00176   }
00177   catch (Exception &e) {
00178     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00179     return 1;
00180   }
00181   return 0;
00182 }
